title: MEMBERSHIP AGREEMENT
subtitle: To the PROCUREDATA Data Space
readyToJoin: Ready to join the Data Space?
readyDescription: Complete the registration process to formalize your membership in the PROCUREDATA Data Space and start exchanging data securely and in compliance with European regulations.

object.title: 2. Contract Object
object.description: Formalization of membership in the Data Space
object.content: This Membership Agreement aims to formalize the Participant's incorporation into the PROCUREDATA Data Space, establishing the terms and conditions that will govern their participation.
commitments: Fully accepts the regulatory and governance framework of the Data Space
Commits to comply with technical, legal and ethical obligations
Recognizes the rights and responsibilities associated with their role
Authorizes the Promoter to verify compliance with requirements

terms.title: 3.1 General Terms and Conditions
items: Definitions and scope of the Data Space

governance.title: 3.2 Governance Mechanisms
items: Governance Committee: Governing body with representation from all stakeholders
Technical Committee: Responsible for technical standards and interoperability
Ethics Committee: Oversight of ethical data use
Security Committee: Risk management and incident response

odrl.title: 3.3 ODRL Policies (Open Digital Rights Language)
items: Definition of permissions, prohibitions and obligations on data
Specification of usage conditions (temporal, geographic, purpose)
Integration with smart contracts for automatic enforcement
Compatibility with IDS and GAIA-X standards

gaiax.title: 3.4 GAIA-X Trust Framework
items: Data sovereignty: Full control over your own data
Interoperability: Use of open standards and documented APIs
Portability: Ability to migrate data between providers

rgpd.title: 3.5 GDPR Compliance
items: Legal basis for personal data processing (Art. 6)
Data subject rights (access, rectification, erasure, portability)

roles.title: 4. Participant Role
roles.description: Select your role in the Data Space

provider.title: Data Provider
provider.description: Entity that contributes datasets to the Data Space for exchange and monetization.

consumer.title: Data Consumer
consumer.description: Entity that accesses and uses data from the Data Space for operations or analysis.

service.title: Service Provider
service.description: Entity that offers intermediation, transformation or value-added services on data.

intermediary.title: Data Intermediary
intermediary.description: Neutral entity that facilitates data exchange between providers and consumers.

altruism.title: Data Altruism Organization
altruism.description: Non-profit entity managing voluntarily donated data for general interest purposes.

duration.title: 5.1 Validity
duration.content: This Membership Agreement will enter into force on the date of signature and will have an indefinite duration, unless expressly terminated by either party.

signature.title: 6. Contract Signature
signature.description: Complete the details and sign electronically
signature.signatureInstructions: Draw your signature in the box
signature.acceptTerms: I accept the terms and conditions of the membership agreement
signature.acceptTermsDescription: I have read and understand all clauses of this contract
signature.acceptGdpr: I accept data processing according to GDPR
signature.acceptGdprDescription: I consent to the processing of my personal data in accordance with current regulations
signature.simpleWarning: This signature has indicative value only. For full legal validity, use qualified signature.
signature.certificateInfo: Upload your FNMT or eID digital certificate in .p12 or .pfx format
signature.eidasInfo: Qualified signature with maximum legal validity according to eIDAS Regulation (EU) 910/2014
signature.autofirmaDesc: Official signing client from the Spanish Government

validation.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions

success.title: Contract Signed!
success.description: Your membership agreement has been successfully signed. You will receive a copy by email.
